summary: 7 usefull spells that will change your gameplay forever unless you uninstall this awsome mod. WIP
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][size=5]Spells:[/size]

1.[size=5]InvisibilityCloaker[/size] - makes you invisible for 4000 sec

2.[size=5]PushingIce[/size] - can push items leaving ice trail

3.[size=5]ParalyseFollower[/size] - will paralyse those in front of you for a long time... once a day ... usefull if you are runing from guards

4.[size=5]TrueSkyform[/size] - my favorite spell that is better version of fus ro dah. it disarms, paralyse enemy (or ally) for 14 sec and clear sky

5.[size=5]IceSpikeForce[/size] - harms targets and send them in sky

6.[size=5]WardShield[/size] - protects you for long time even at new started game

7.[size=5]FrostServant[/size] - creates creature that fights for you for some time looks like FrostAtronach

all spells are bounty free (wont give you bounty if used on ally ... i personaly tested ... many times)

spells can be found in DragonsReach balcony
this is my first mod
new spells are on the way
made by [size=5]Dadoren[/size][/b][/size]
author: Dadoren
